content:
Image Prompt:

Description: A marvelous split-screen image of Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Zooey Deschanel inspired by the style of Edward Hopper, created in shades of blue using oil painting technique. The image is an emotional portrayal of the highs and lows of love and is rendered in HDR and 8K resolution with an aspect ratio of 3:4. On the left side of the split-screen, Joseph Gordon-Levitt is shown looking happy and in love, gazing into the eyes of Zooey Deschanel. On the right side, he is shown sitting alone on a bench, looking sad and dejected with an empty space beside him. The background of the image is a cityscape in shades of blue, with the lighting and shadows adding to the dramatic effect of the image. The oil painting technique is used to add texture and depth to the image, capturing the roughness of the bench and the softness of the characters' clothing. The result is a stunningly realistic and emotional portrayal of the story of "(500) Days of Summer."
